description: A shell script for detecting and backing up various types of databases (SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB). It checks for the presence of each database type, verifies if the database is running, and performs a backup accordingly. The script handles different configurations and fallback mechanisms, providing user feedback and exit status based on success or failure.
external_files: /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock (MySQL socket file, typically present on Linux systems)
